1.2.name: wordpress/wpcontenteditable
1.2.description: ClickToEdit will make your site 'live' to authors so they can edit titles and body copy. Additional functions mean you can make any piece of content: title, body or custom field, instantly editable. Great for tweaking copy or fixing errors on the fly.
